name: Mickey's Miami Noir
description:
9 tracks of original Midi-Jazz compositions by Mickey de Grand IV. CC#95. 2013.

name: Dreamboat - "Special Kiss" 12"
description:
Produced and composed by Mickey de Grand IV + EDG4R as Dreamboat. Featuring two original songs and a remix by Tom Noble (Disco Tom, Superior Elevation Records, Liger Music). Distributed by Peoples Potential Unlimited. 2013 CC#92

name: Stevezy - "Dadeland"
description:
Brought to you by Cosmic Chronic and Dale Zine USA/Super Great is the debut release of Stevezy, the Miami based producer and designer who was featured extensively on Kabuki Iron Kolors' Episode #2. "Dadeland" is a journey through postmodern beat dimensions and synthesis of short, rapid sounds sprawled across harmonic timbres and 3D audio. Features Kabuki Iron Kolors on Assistant Production. 60 minutes. 2012. Design by Stevezy. Cassettes were limited and are now sold out*



<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/125484372%3Fsecret_token%3Ds-lkO9r&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Night School  - "Diamond Eye"  - Free Download
description:
Debut single from Miami producer Night School. Dusty boogie samples modified for the 2012 305 sound. CC#91. 2012. Download for free on our Soundcloud Page:

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/56810283&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Miami Players Club - Foreign Affairs Mix
description:
Cosmic Chronic & Stray Rats present 'Miami Players Club - Foreign Affairs' mix tape. Exclusive t-shirt available at www.strayrats.com. 2013.


<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/105514841&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Antoine Rocky-Horror - "Machine Gun Boogie" 7"
description:
Brought to you by Cosmic Chronic, this hot 45 was produced and composed by Miami's own Antoine Rocky-Horror. Features the legendary Adrian Molina (The Molina Brothers, King Joffy + The Island Girls) on the B-side "Sophia." Distributed by Peoples Potential Unlimited. 2012. Repressed in 2013.

*LISTEN

name: Mickey de Grand IV - "My Outer Space Lover" Book
description:
Brought to you by Dale Zine and Cosmic Chronic, "My Outer Space Lover" is a selection of multidisciplinary visual works created by composer Mickey de Grand IV. This collection spans 11 years (2001-2012) and  has been organized into three categories: Music Art, Illustration and Photos. Printed on high quality materials. 7x7. 137 pages. 2012.

*The book will usually arrive 7-9 business days after order is placed. Fed Ex Only.

name: Psychic Mirrors - Third Eye Tee
description: Psychic Mirrors - Third Eye Tee. Printed on high quality, soft, Heather Gray tees. 2011. Limited to 25.

name: COMPILATION - Magic City Hits Volume #1: Beach Party
description:
Brought to you by Cosmic Chronic, this compilation contains hits from Magic City artists such as Miami Players Club, Benton, Team Rojas, Kabuki Iron Kolors, Psychic Mirrors, Cuchito, and Diamond D.
15 tracks. Released on September 21st, 2011. 


<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/125468574%3Fsecret_token%3Ds-wyakZ&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Diamond D  & The Funky 3 - "Revenge"
description:
Brought to you by Diamond D & The Funky 3, this 6 minute Electric Boogie track was produced with cheap computer loops in 2011 by Diamond D himself, Princeton James, Khaled Mambo, and Gold Mercedes. Monster Miami boogie. 

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/125483531%3Fsecret_token%3Ds-d6ByM&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Dale Zine - Super Great
description:
16 pages full color. Works by Sam Borkson, Tury Sandoval,
Jen Stark, Freegums, Jack Teagle, Philipp Dornbierer, Rosie Eisor, Jay Cover, Stevezy, Ice Sak (DFW), Kabuki Iron Kolors and many more!

Every book comes with freebies. Pins, stickers, pogs, etc.

name: Psychic Mirrors - I Come For Your Love 12"
description:
This Miami style electric boogie-funk 12" was composed, produced and arranged solely by Mickey de Grand IV of Psychic Mirrors. Brought to you by Cosmic Chronic and distributed by Peoples Potential Unlimited. Released on September 10th, 2011. Repressed in 2012.

Featuring Cecilia de Cardenas.
Mastered by Dave Cooley.

Available in OG Black, Rhino Chronic (Limited) and Glass House (Limited) vinyl.


Side A: "I Come For Your Love"
Side B: "The Witching Hour"

33 1/2 rpm.


<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/25160703&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Psychic Mirrors - Dimension of Love Tee
description: Psychic Mirrors - Dimension of Love Tee. Screen printed on high quality, soft white cotton jersey tees. 2011. Limited to 25.

name: Miami Players Club - You've Got To Be Real
description:
Brought to you by Cosmic Chronic, this Miami Boogie instrumental was produced by Mickey de Grand IV and Miami Players Club in Summer of 2011. 

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/21508254&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Mickey de Grand IV - Little Havana (Radio Edit)
description:
Produced and Composed by Mickey de Grand IV (Psychic Mirrors, Miami Players Club), this minimal Cuban Disco track was originally intended for a (now) defunct documentary on Miami street culture. 2011. 

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/56579438&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Psychic Mirrors - I Come For Your Love
description:
These Miami style electric boogie-funk tracks were composed, produced and arranged solely by Mickey de Grand IV of Psychic Mirrors. Brought to you by Cosmic Chronic. Released on September 10th, 2011. 

1. "I Come For Your Love"
2. "The Witching Hour"


<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/25160703&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Bertha Sandoval - La Reina del Sol
description:
Brought to you by Cosmic Chronic and produced by Mickey de Grand IV (Psychic Mirrors, Miami Players Club), this collection contains 28 Cuban jazz ballad tracks recorded by his grandmother, Bertha Sandoval, between 1969 and 1972 in Miami, FL. 

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/125483901%3Fsecret_token%3Ds-RGurj&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: EDG4R + Erick Rojas - INTRICACIES
description:
Originally available exclusively at Turntable Lab NY, Cosmic Chronic brings you the digital release of their 2012 mix. Featuring original boogie edits, disco, and Chicago house.


<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/125485436%3Fsecret_token%3Ds-uFTyk&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Kabuki Iron Kolors - The Lost & Haunted New York Tape
description:
Cosmic Chronic presents an old & dusty beat tape produced by Kabuki Iron Kolors on Halloween Night in 2006. 


<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/125483750%3Fsecret_token%3Ds-m5nfl&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Psychic Mirrors - Mystic Hustle 7"
description:
Cosmic Chronic presents Mystic Hustle, the second release of 2011 by the 11-piece Miami style boogie-funk ensemble, Psychic Mirrors. Available on OG black and limited edition Sour Diesel green vinyl. Distributed by Peoples Potential Unlimited. Side A: "Mystic Hustle" Side B: "Dark Shadows" 45 rpm.

*LISTEN

name: Mickey de Grand IV - The Seven Witches Suite
description:
Brought to you by Cosmic Chronic, Mickey de Grand IV's "The Seven Witches Suite" is an orchestral narrative about a secret meeting held in a dark castle by seven different witches from around the world. 2011.


<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/125482964%3Fsecret_token%3Ds-KTGjJ&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Benton + Kabuki Iron Kolors Present - The Muppets Take Miami!
description:
Brought to you by Benton and Kabuki Iron Kolors, this is a groove narrative following the adventure of Jim Henson's Muppets on the tough streets of Miami. 20 tracks. 2010.


<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/125485989%3Fsecret_token%3Ds-RbcYW&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Kabuki Iron Kolors - Cosmo Head Jazzzz
description:
Brought to you by Cosmic Chronic, "Cosmo Head Jazzzz" is a lost experimental jazz tape made in 2006 by Kabuki Iron Kolors. 


<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/125482758%3Fsecret_token%3Ds-mfHbK&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Kabuki Iron Kolors - Story Hour Tapes - Episode #3
description:
Brought to you by Cosmic Chronic, this is the third installment in Kabuki Iron Kolors' epic saga: Story Hour Tapes. This episode features Luma Junger and Stevezy. 30 Tracks of future Samba/bossa nova wilderness. 2010.


<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/125482432%3Fsecret_token%3Ds-GkZ7Q&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Kabuki Iron Kolors - Story Hour Tapes - Episode #2
description:
Brought to you by Cosmic Chronic, this is episode #2 of the 13-episode saga in Kabuki's Story Hour Tapes. Produced by Kabuki Iron Kolors and his very special guest Stevezy. 28 tracks of raw. 2010.



<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/125482346%3Fsecret_token%3Ds-65T10&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Kabuki Iron Kolors - Story Hour Tapes - Episode #1
description: Brought to you by Cosmic Chronic, Kabuki iron Kolors' Story Hour Tapes Episode #1 is a 27 track journey of boogie funk fantasy and science fiction exploration set in Miami, FL. 2010.

name: Kabuki Iron Kolors - Story Hour Tapes - Episode #0
description:
Brought to you by Cosmic Chronic, this is the prequel to Kabuki Iron Kolors' Story Hour Tapes, which began in 2009 following this release. 37 tracks of jazz madness. 

STORY HOUR TAPES: EPISODE #0: THE GREAT SWINGING COSMO HEAD
